title: Download DropFi Wallet
description: Get started with DropFi - the most secure and user-friendly XRPL wallet for trading, liquidity provision, and NFT management.

components.title: Download DropFi today
components.description: Get true decentralized access to the XRP network.

steps.title: Download DropFi Wallet
steps.description: Choose your preferred platform and download the DropFi wallet application.
steps.details: DropFi is available on all major platforms including iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and Linux. You can also access it directly through your web browser.

steps.title: Create Your Wallet
steps.description: Generate a new wallet or import an existing one using your seed phrase.
steps.details: For new users, DropFi will generate a secure 24-word seed phrase. Write this down and store it safely - it's your backup to recover your wallet.

steps.title: Secure Your Account
steps.description: Set up additional security measures like PIN, biometrics, or hardware wallet.
steps.details: Enable two-factor authentication and consider using a hardware wallet for maximum security when dealing with large amounts.

steps.title: Add Funds
steps.description: Purchase XRP or transfer existing funds to your DropFi wallet.
steps.details: You can buy XRP directly within the app using various payment methods, or transfer from other wallets or exchanges.

steps.title: Start Trading
steps.description: Connect to DropFi DEX and start swapping tokens with minimal fees.
steps.details: Your wallet is now ready to use with all DropFi features including token swapping, liquidity provision, and NFT trading.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: All data is encrypted locally on your device

features.title: Hardware Wallet Support
features.description: Connect Ledger, Trezor, and other hardware wallets

features.title: Biometric Authentication
features.description: Use fingerprint or face recognition for quick access

features.title: Multi-Signature Support
features.description: Require multiple approvals for large transactions

components.title: Ready to Start Trading?
